author: Staff Reporter
text:
The City Municipal Corporation has lodged a compliant against an Erode-based private organisation for proposing to conduct a vaccination camp without obtaining permission from civic body.

Recently, the organisation collected money from residents in Ward 37, 38 and 39 assuring to vaccinate their children for Hepatitis B. However, based on information, officials inspected the spot and warned the organisation not to conduct the proposed camp. City Health Officer R. Selvakuma lodged a complaint against the organisation in Ammapet police station on Saturday seeking action against the organisation. The police are investigating.
title: Complaint lodged against private firm
